Class GameCharacter

  • java.lang.Object
    • skynail.domain.GameCharacter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Companion, Monster

    public class GameCharacter
extends Object
    Basic class for characters containing game logic for battle scenes.

    lmantyla
